description: Bengaluru-based StoreKing will use the funds to expand their team, enter tier III markets and tie up with 1 lakh retailers by 2017.

description: The notice comes in response to a challan filed by the Delhi transport department against Kalanick and Jain for operating as travel agents for cabs caught plying illegally in the city.
title: Uber CEO Travis Kalanick, India Head Amit Jain summoned by Delhi court

description: An accelerator program will be launched in India and Israel and it will be a part of T-Hub's T-Challenge program charter which will focus on agri-tech startups.

description: Installation of EBW machine is as simple as plug and play and it is a mobile unit that can be installed anywhere. They are also regularly tested by Hero Moto Corp.

title: Competition to get hotter for e-tailers, says Mohandas Pai

description: As a part of its social ride-sharing platform, Ola has helped keep 3,75,090 vehicles off the road in Mumbai, since its launch in February 2016, Ola said in a statement.
title: Ola claims to have helped in bringing down carbon dioxide emissions in Mumbai

title: Fashion & apparels category grown over four times y-o-y: Paytm

description: According to the EY Global Job Creation Survey 2016, entrepreneurs are more than twice as likely to be hiring new staff this year as large corporates.
title: Entrepreneurs boost hiring plans as economic confidence grows

description: With overall funding for startups slowing down in the last two quarters, high-profile ventures are turning to government funds to create "private IPOs" rather than to venture capitalists.
title: Sovereign wealth funds throw funding lifeline to technology ventures

description: The announcement takes total investment commitment in India by Amazon, which is competing with market leader Flipkart for the top spot, to $5 billion.
